basics.name: Otavio Paz Nascimento
basics.label: Undergraduate Researcher
basics.summary: Brazilian int'l student, future inventor, constantly combining robotics, renewable energy, and human-centered technologies.

work.name: Computer Science Department, Oberlin College
work.summary: Acquired foundational skills in ROS and Gazebo for robotic simulations. Improved the product’s documentation for a better user experience with the guidance of Prof. McCarrin. Currently, researching on reinforcement learning techniques, such as DDPG, TD3, and DQN, for navigation and obstacle avoidance in a TurtleBot3 platform, where we are adding to the work of Tomas van Rietbergen from TU Delft.

volunteer.summary: Created motion graphics for the segments of an LGBT+ NGO in Brazil (TV/Radio/Podcast/Store), added subtitles, and made videos and live stream edits for Instagram and IGTV. Developed 2 filters for donation information using Spark AR.

education.area: 3-2 Engineering and Computer Science major, Physics minor

education.institution: Insituto Federal de Sao Paulo, Salto

awards.title: Best Beginners Hack
awards.summary: HackHolyoke is a 24-hour hackathon hosted every year by students at Mount Holyoke College.'

certificates.name: Industrial Automation Technician
certificates.issuer: Instituto Federal De São Paulo - Salto

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
